message.body: Nice find, Skidmore. It's good to hear from you.
How are you?
I'm good. How are you?
I'm doing well. Just relaxing with Nina
Do you watch Breaking Bad?
No, I hear good things
It's so good. You'd really enjoy it
Is it violent?
Rarely. It gets nasty from time to time. But the story is so good and Bryan Cranston is phenomenal
Maybe ill check it out. How's your heart?
My heart is pretty quiet these days. I've been reading a lot of Pema Chödrön. How's yours?
Who's that? I'm really eager to get home for Christmas.
Me too. She's a Buddhist teacher. Meditation, being good to yourself, that sort of thing ;)
Oh btw, new black keys. I'm dead.
You're dead?
It's really great.
Yeah yeah Stuckey. The video for Lonely Boy was pretty funny though
You don't believe me? Look up 'run right back to her'
Relax, I will after church. Im just goofin' I love them
http://open.spotify.com/track/5KBoVRXW0KPLjO7sIxeFmg
Don't pull that "relax" stuff with me...
Do you like the solo Auerbach song?
I'm at a gig so I can't listen to it right now but I think you sent it to me vefore and I really liked it
Oops. I do like that one in particular a lot.
I want to hear some of your recent originals...
I have nice melodies with lame words. Send me poetry. Did I tell you I'm in a production of Les Mis? I'm a student, Combferre and Legeles
It's Dec 7th and 8th.
Exciting! Tell me more...
It's about 15 bands from Nashville that are collaborating. Neil and I and Wayne from the Protomen. Wayne is Valjan. We're rehearsing with the orchestra right now. Its been a hoot
Oh my god that's amazing
I'd never heard the score until two months ago. I love these songs
I've heard them a bunch so they've lost their shimmer for me but it's great writing. Do you play an instrument too?
No, just sing
